line_1: With generous sentiments his heart o'erflow'd:
line_2: With generous love his youthful bosom glow'd,

line_1: Her tongue with many a horrid tale o'erflowed,
line_2: Her grateful thanks upon the knight bestowed,

line_1: Thy soul with grateful tenderness o'erflowed,
line_2: And many a sigh for thy return bestowed:

line_1: What tho' the rich, whose coffers overflow'd,
line_2: With oftentation their vain alms bestow'd,

line_1: With grateful sentiments his heart o'erflow'd,
line_2: And in the warmest words millions of thanks bestow'd.

line_1: When the dire cup with every ill o'erflow'd,
line_2: Such was the cordial that kind heaven bestow'd
